reviews.review_msg: Stuart is a thoughtful and caring professor. Lots of hands on assignments for marks and a reading log. He knows a lot about art. I would have no problem taking another course with him. Interested in what his students have to say. Very respectful of people's ideas.

Stuart is a very interesting teacher and has a good knowledge of art. He is a very fair professor and just asks that students are punctual and prepared. He is very respectful and is more than eager to help and discuss any concerns. I would have no reservations taking another class with him. All in all you get the mark you work for. He is fair.
This gentle man EARNED the excellence in teaching award he was given.  Undergrads, think a minute.... He wants the same from you.
He is a teacher with manners and loads of experiences. His marking is not harsh, many things are negociatable. Although his class might be boring at times, he is very nice indeed.
Stuart is so great!  Fun assignments, interesting readings, relatable experience, and fun to watch-he's like a character from a Christopher Guest movie; very quirky!
